scope.title: Digitalisation Foundations
scope.description: A practical introduction to data, platforms and journeys in a digital energy world, written as my own notes.
scope.summary: A practical introduction to data, platforms and journeys in a digital energy world, written as my own notes.
learningObjectives: Understand what digitalisation means and how it differs from digitisation and automation.
Explain how data, processes, and people fit together in a digital operating model.
Apply basic journey and outcome thinking to a simple service.
Evaluate common digital trade offs between speed, risk, and reliability.
